ygData.subject: Re: Enjoy the Veterans Day break (off topic)
ygData.msgSnippet: Galtin... I know i have a relatively low level bard so she won t be able to hang with you...but my druid would be happy to join up with you.  I have someplace
ygData.messageBody:
Galtin...

I know i have a relatively low level bard so she won't be able to hang
with you...but my druid would be happy to join up with you. I have
someplace to take you and you are a very good level to go...not to
mention that your bard songs will kick ass here....or I would be happy
to go kill some HG with you...and my lvl 31 ranger friend. Between all
of us we can definately go giant hunting *evil grin* I will look you
up with my druid..Crysarra. I know we have talked in game before...so
give me a tell and if you want we can group up.

Crysarra lvl 29 druid
Chisarra lvl 8 bard

> For you E'ci bards (Kitasi, Faras, Aloro, Laluni, et.al.), look me up
> if you are
> online. Maybe we can all get together and work on getting quest
> components for
> our armor. I'm getting tired of MM and was thinking about heading to
> Solusek.
> An enchanter friend who is 35th level has already agreed to help me
> fight giants
> in order to get some lambent stones as well.
>
> Take care
> Galtin of E'ci
>
>
